title: $725 Weekly - Fully Furnished Suite Uptown Mpls - "House of Dance"
posting_body: ['Enjoy modern amenities and convenience in a house where the romance and splendor of the Victorian era have been lovingly preserved.', 'This suite features a brand new queen size bed with 500 thread count linens.', 'The tile and wood fireplace originally burned coal, but now serves as a beautiful period detail.', 'Includes well lit garage space, automatic door opener, 24/7 access.', 'Secure compound with camera surveillance.', 'Options available:', 'Daily rate Monday thru Thursday - $115', 'Daily rate Friday thru Sunday - $145', 'Monthly rate - $2100', 'Weekly rate - $725', 'No damage deposit required.', '(Tenant will be responsible if damages are incurred.)', 'In the kitchen, an automatic Keurig coffee and tea maker along with pods starts your morning with ease.', 'A fully equipped kitchen featuring beautiful granite countertops makes eating in fun.', 'Meal prep is simple with a full set of cookware, knives and spices.', 'Enjoy your meal on bone china with linen napkins at the four person mahogany dining table.', 'The dining and living area features a leather sleeper sofa so this suite accommodates four guests.', 'You’ll find extra linens for the bed in the closet or I can make it up for you if you let me know ahead of time.', 'The remodeled bathroom features new subway tile and an old fashioned claw foot bathtub.', 'You’ll find it well stocked with shampoo, conditioner, body wash, a fresh bar of soap and fluffy white towels.', 'Guests also have access to the washer and dryer and free off-street parking.', 'My 1895 era house is located in Uptown, one of the most walkable neighborhoods in Minneapolis.', 'You’ll find yourself a short walk from the Walker Art Museum and its famous “Spoon Bridge” sculpture, Lake of the Isles, The Wedge Coop Grocery Store, Spyhouse Coffee and The Basilica of St. Mary.', 'Contact Daniel at', 'show contact info', 'Guest access', 'I will provide you with a key upon arrival.', 'You are renting one of six units in my home.', 'Interaction with guests', 'I am as available as you need me to be.', "Don't hesitate to call or text with questions, even if you just need a restaurant suggestion.", "I'm here!", 'About Me', 'My name is Daniel.', 'I purchased this house in 2001 and have been lovingly renovating it ever since.', 'I have honored the spirit of the original building while thoughtfully adding my own touches and inspiration.', 'One of my great passions in life is Argentine Tango so I named each apartment after a beloved Argentine musician.', 'If you are curious about the dance scene in the Twin Cities, I’m happy to point you towards the best milongas and I also offer lessons.', 'Other things to note', "If I were visiting Minneapolis and could only do one thing, I'd rent a Nice Ride and bike around the sparkling chain of Lakes.", 'Lake of the Isles, Lake Bde Maka Ska and Lake Harriet are all nearby.', 'Pop over to Spyhouse for a caffeine fix or stop at Nightingale for oysters and other fancy bar snacks.', '#minneapolisapartment #minneapolisrent #minneapolisfurnishedapartment  #uptownapartment', 'More time to enjoy?', 'Stroll over to the Walker Art Center and take a selfie in the outdoor sculpture garden with the iconic "Spoon Bridge" or cherry on a spoon.', 'Or head over to Eat Street on Nicollet Ave for a whole world of dining options and pay a visit to the Minneapolis Art Institute.', 'Other popular stops in the Twin Cities are The Guthrie Theater, Stone Arch Bridge, Surly Brewing Co for craft beers and delicious food, or a visit to the iconic Mall of America.', 'We’ve got plenty to offer sports fans too with the Minnesota Twins at Target Field, the Timberwolves at Target Center and the Vikings at U.S Bank Stadium.']
